description:
+++++++++++

Note: Over 2,300 students since the course was published and Great Ratings.

Our courses on Udemy have been taken by over 21,000 students from 159 Countries.

We have a thriving community in the course and we are actively involved and answer questions within 24h.

+++++++++++

Quantum Leap: A bootcamp to jump start or start up your business: Know your tribe, master your message, increase revenue and plan for success.

This 6 part business start-up BOOTCAMP will take the guesswork out of business creation and expansion. We have personally used these exact tools to create rapid success, and in this program we are offering you OUR proven, step-by-step process.

This program is for you if:

  • You’re a small business owner, budding entrepreneur, life coach, practitioner, or you’re plotting your escape from the corporate box
  • You want to either start a business or expand a current one
  • You want to do what you love and get paid for it
  • You want your business to work for you instead of feeling like you are a slave to it
  • You’re ready to create a thriving business now, not 5 years from now
  • You want to commit to a “real” business strategy, not just a short term gimmick

What this program is NOT:

Most people who buy any “how to grow a business” training will not make any money, whatsoever. In this program our rules are:

No “fake experts”

No “do nothing, get paid”

No “get rich quick”

In this course you’ll learn how to:

  • Turn your ideas into concrete strategies and action steps
  • Quit wasting time and laser focus on INCOME PRODUCING results
  • Create rapid growth in 6 simple steps
  • Avoid overwhelm or spinning your wheels
  • Discover your tribe of ideal customers
  • Write effective marketing copy
  • Learn tools to stay motivated and inspired
  • Do more of what you love and get paid for it
  • Find additional revenue streams

If any of this resonates with you I've got GREAT news for you: you are SO in the right place right now!

In the 6-Week BOOTCAMP will take you by the hand and PERSONALLY walk you through the process of creating your dream and the freedom you crave.

You see, we've figured it all out AND we're laying it out for you so you can easily duplicate our success. Our 6 week system for launching an idea and transforming it into a functional business has been the KEY to us creating a multi-six figure business in just 3 years. This being a business that was created from scratch, with only a couple of hundred dollars in the bank account. Not to mention we've used this same process to create new business after new business, all with rapid success.

Our "Business Creation Resume" includes: an import business, a resale business buying surplus at pennies and selling at top dollar, a non-profit teen center, a photography company, a T-shirt company, a regional and national magazine, a publishing company, a holistic center, and a consulting and coaching company, and, of course, online courses. What we found was that every business venture had the same process to jump start—or QUANTUM LEAP—it into success.

But it's deeper than that. You see, we LOVE more than anything to teach people how to take an idea and create it into a reality. Why? Because our process is such a FAST and EASY way to get results and it's SO exciting to get to share it with other entrepreneurs who want to do their part to make the world a better place.

So, ARE YOU READY TO QUANTUM LEAP?

Below are the 6 Steps to Quantum Leaping Your Business in 6 Weeks

(Although this program is designed to quantum leap your business in 6 weeks, it can be implemented at your own pace.)

1. CREATE: Make Your Idea Concrete
2. CONNECT: Get to Know Your Tribe
3. COMMUNICATE: Define Your Message
4. CAPITALIZE (MONETIZATION): Make Money with Your Mission
5. COMMIT (ACTION): Take Action Steps for Success
6. CULTIVATE MOTIVATION: Stay Inspired and Accountable

Detailed Course Outline:

CREATE: Making Your Idea Concrete

  • The most effective brainstorming strategies
  • Hosting a brainstorming party
  • How to determine research questions
  • The best resources for research
  • How to sift for gold without overwhelm

CONNECT: Get to Know Your Tribe

  • How to learn everything you need to know about your tribe
  • How and where to find them and connect to them
  • Identify the best REFERRAL PARTNERS that work for what YOU do

COMMUNICATE: Define Your Message

  • How to connect through your own story
  • Establish credibility and putting on your expert hat
  • Craft your message and writing your promotional copy
  • How to value your offer
  • How to write an powerful elevator pitch
  • Write your MANIFESTO and start a MOVEMENT
  • How to get our message OUT THERE (marketing)

CAPITALIZE: Make Money with Your Mission

  • Strengthen your money mindset (eliminate money blocks)
  • Understanding your motives
  • Get creative with the money game
  • Identifying revenue streams
  • Setting your pricing and feel confident

COMMIT: Action Steps and Strategy

  • Understanding the power and misconceptions of commitment
  • How to find accountability partners
  • Knowing your needs and financial base line
  • Turn common excuses into commitments
  • Goal setting with the “Ta-Da” List and
    30-60-90 Plan
  • Assessing your results

CULTIVATE: Motivation and Inspiration

  • Having a big enough reason
  • Monitoring self talk
  • Eliminating limiting beliefs
  • Lighting the fire
  • Avoiding de-motivation
  • Learning from failure
  • Creating balance
  • Celebrating success
  • Enjoying the journey
title: Quantum Leap Your Business in 6 Weeks
